tool_description: API to convert CSV files to JSON format and returns JSON.
name: CSV to JSON
title: CSV to JSON

api_list.name: Convert CSV file to JSON
api_list.description:
This endpoint will return JSON formatted response  for sent CSV file.
**NOTE: ** 
-  This is a POST method.
- REQUIRED NAME FOR input file is *csv*:
    `<form method="post" action="exampleAction" enctype="multipart/form-data">
        <input type="file" name="csv">
        <input type="submit">
    </form>`
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://csv-to-json1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "csv-to-json1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://csv-to-json1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
